data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: What are some things that you do to show other people that you care about them? What are some things that other people do to show that they care about you?
data.answer: There are many things that I will do to show others that I really care about them. For example, whenever a friend feels sad, I will call them and encourage them to cheer up. I will be a good listener to listen to their stories and give my advice. People also show their concerns about me by sharing their happiness with me. Whenever I need help, I know they will be there.（72 字）
